metadata.title: CVE-2024-53204 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:phy: realtek: usb: fix NULL deref in rtk_usb3phy_probeIn rtk_usb3phy_probe() devm_kzalloc() may return NULLbut this returned value is not checked.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
